00058 /**
00059    ## FUNCTION: 
00060         write_single_pdb
00061   
00062    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00063         Write atoms and vertices given in argument in the following standard v2.2 
00064         pdb format.
00065 
00066   
00067    ## PARAMETRES:
00068         @ const char out[]       : Output file name
00069         @ s_pdb *pdb             : PDB infos
00070         @ c_lst_pockets *pockets : All pockets
00071   
00072    ## RETURN:
00073   
00074 */
00075 void write_pockets_single_pdb(const char out[],  s_pdb *pdb, c_lst_pockets *pockets) 
00076 {
00077         node_pocket *nextPocket ;
00078         node_vertice *nextVertice ;
00079         FILE *f = fopen(out, "w") ;
00080         if(f) {
00081                 if(pdb) {
00082                         if(pdb->latoms) write_pdb_atoms(f, pdb->latoms, pdb->natoms ) ;
00083                 }
00084 
00085                 if(pockets){
00086                         pockets->current = pockets->first ;
00087 
00088                         while(pockets->current){
00089                                 pockets->current->pocket->v_lst->current = pockets->current->pocket->v_lst->first ;
00090 
00091                                 while(pockets->current->pocket->v_lst->current){
00092                                         write_pdb_vert(f, pockets->current->pocket->v_lst->current->vertice) ;
00093 
00094                                         nextVertice = pockets->current->pocket->v_lst->current->next;
00095                                         pockets->current->pocket->v_lst->current = nextVertice;
00096                                 }
00097 
00098                                 nextPocket=pockets->current->next;
00099                                 pockets->current=nextPocket;
00100                         }
00101                 }
00102 
00103                 fclose(f) ;
00104         }
00105         else {
00106                 fprintf(stderr, "! The file %s could not be opened!\n", out);
00107         }
00108 }
00109 
00110 /**
00111    ## FUNCTION: 
00112         write_pdb_atoms
00113   
00114    ## SPECIFICATION:
00115         Print list of atoms as pdb format in given buffer
00116   
00117    ## PARAMETRES:
00118         @ FILE *f      : Buffer to write in.
00119         @ s_atm *atoms : List of atoms
00120         @ int natoms   : Number of atoms
00121   
00122    ## RETURN:
00123   
00124 */
00125 void write_pdb_atoms(FILE *f, s_atm *atoms, int natoms) 
00126 {
00127         s_atm *atom = NULL ;
00128         int i = 0 ;
00129         for(i = 0 ; i < natoms ; i++) {
00130                 atom = atoms + i ;
00131                 write_pdb_atom_line(f, atom->type, atom->id, atom->name, atom->pdb_aloc, 
00132                                                         atom->res_name, atom->chain, atom->res_id, 
00133                                                         atom->pdb_insert, atom->x, atom->y, atom->z,
00134                                                         atom->occupancy, atom->bfactor, atom->symbol, 
00135                                                         atom->charge);
00136         }
00137 }

00139 /**
00140    ## FUNCTION:
00141         write_pockets_single_pqr
00142   
00143    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00144         Write only pockets (alpha sphere) given in argument in the pqr format.
00145 
00146         !! No atoms writen here, only all pockets in a single pqr file.
00147   
00148    ## PARAMETRES:
00149         @ const char out[]       : Output file path
00150         @ c_lst_pockets *pockets : List of pockets
00151   
00152    ## RETURN:
00153   
00154 */
00155 void write_pockets_single_pqr(const char out[], c_lst_pockets *pockets) 
00156 {
00157         node_pocket *nextPocket ;
00158         node_vertice *nextVertice ;
00159 
00160         FILE *f = fopen(out, "w") ;
00161         if(f) {
00162 
00163                 if(pockets){
00164                 fprintf(f, "HEADER\n") ;
00165                 fprintf(f, "HEADER This is a pqr format file writen by the programm fpocket.                 \n") ;
00166                 fprintf(f, "HEADER It contains all the pockets vertices found by fpocket.                    \n") ;
00167                         pockets->current = pockets->first ;
00168 
00169                         while(pockets->current){
00170                                 pockets->current->pocket->v_lst->current = pockets->current->pocket->v_lst->first ;
00171 
00172                                 while(pockets->current->pocket->v_lst->current){
00173                                         write_pqr_vert(f, pockets->current->pocket->v_lst->current->vertice) ;
00174 
00175                                         nextVertice = pockets->current->pocket->v_lst->current->next;
00176                                         pockets->current->pocket->v_lst->current = nextVertice;
00177                                 }
00178 
00179                                 nextPocket=pockets->current->next;
00180                                 pockets->current=nextPocket;
00181                         }
00182                 }
00183 
00184                 fprintf(f, "TER\nEND\n") ;
00185                 fclose(f) ;
00186         }
00187         else {
00188                 fprintf(stderr, "! The file %s could not be opened!\n", out);
00189         }
00190 }
00191 
00192 /**
00193    ## FUNCTION:
00194         write_each_pocket
00195   
00196    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00197         Write each pocket in a single pqr (vertices) and pdb (atoms) file format.
00198   
00199    ## PARAMETRES:
00200         @ const char out[]       : Output file path
00201         @ c_lst_pockets *pockets : List of pockets
00202   
00203    ## RETURN:
00204   
00205 */
00206 void write_each_pocket(const char out_path[], c_lst_pockets *pockets)
00207 {
00208         int out_len = strlen(out_path) ;
00209         char out[out_len+20] ;
00210         out[0] = '\0' ;
00211 
00212         node_pocket *pcur ;
00213         
00214         int i = 0 ;
00215         if(pockets){
00216                 pcur = pockets->first ;
00217 
00218                 while(pcur){
00219                         sprintf(out, "%s/pocket%d_vert.pqr", out_path, i) ;
00220                         write_pocket_pqr(out, pcur->pocket) ;
00221 
00222                         sprintf(out, "%s/pocket%d_atm.pdb", out_path, i) ;
00223                         write_pocket_pdb(out, pcur->pocket) ;
00224 
00225                         pcur = pcur->next ;
00226                         i++ ;
00227                 }
00228         }
00229         else {
00230                 fprintf(stderr, "! The file %s could not be opened!\n", out);
00231         }
00232 }
00233 
00234 /**
00235    ## FUNCTION:
00236         void write_pocket_pqr
00237   
00238    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00239         Write vertices of the pocket given in argument in the pqr format.
00240 
00241   
00242    ## PARAMETRES:
00243         @ const char out[]  : Output file path
00244         @ s_pocket *pocket : The pocket to write
00245   
00246    ## RETURN:
00247   
00248 */
00249 void write_pocket_pqr(const char out[], s_pocket *pocket) 
00250 {
00251         node_vertice *vcur = NULL ;
00252 
00253         FILE *f = fopen(out, "w") ;
00254         if(f && pocket) {
00255                 fprintf(f, "HEADER\n") ;
00256                 fprintf(f, "HEADER This is a pqr format file writen by the programm fpocket.                 \n") ;
00257                 fprintf(f, "HEADER It represent the voronoi vertices of a single pocket found by the         \n") ;
00258                 fprintf(f, "HEADER algorithm.                                                                \n") ;
00259                 fprintf(f, "HEADER                                                                           \n") ;
00260                 fprintf(f, "HEADER Information about the pocket %5d:\n", pocket->v_lst->first->vertice->resid) ;
00261                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 0  - Pocket Score                      : %.4f\n", pocket->score) ;
00262                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 1  - Number of V. Vertices             : %5d\n", pocket->pdesc->nb_asph) ;
00263                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 2  - Mean alpha-sphere radius          : %.4f\n", pocket->pdesc->mean_asph_ray) ;
00264                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 3  - Mean alpha-sphere SA              : %.4f\n", pocket->pdesc->masph_sacc) ;
00265                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 4  - Mean B-factor                     : %.4f\n", pocket->pdesc->flex) ;
00266                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 5  - Hydrophobicity Score              : %.4f\n", pocket->pdesc->hydrophobicity_score) ;
00267                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 6  - Polarity Score                    : %5d\n", pocket->pdesc->polarity_score) ;
00268                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 7  - Volume Score                      : %.4f\n", pocket->pdesc->volume_score) ;
00269                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 8  - Real volume (approximation)       : %.4f\n", pocket->pdesc->volume) ;
00270                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 9  - Charge Score                      : %5d\n", pocket->pdesc->charge_score) ;
00271                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 10 - Local hydrophobic density Score   : %.4f\n", pocket->pdesc->mean_loc_hyd_dens) ;
00272                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 11 - Number of apolar alpha sphere     : %5d\n", pocket->nAlphaApol) ;
00273                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 12 - Proportion of apolar alpha sphere : %.4f\n", pocket->pdesc->apolar_asphere_prop) ;
00274 
00275                 vcur = pocket->v_lst->first ;
00276 
00277                 while(vcur){
00278                         write_pqr_vert(f, vcur->vertice) ;
00279 
00280                         vcur = vcur->next ;
00281                 }
00282 
00283                 fprintf(f, "TER\nEND\n") ;
00284                 fclose(f) ;
00285         }
00286         else {
00287                 if(!f) fprintf(stderr, "! The file %s could not be opened!\n", out);
00288                 else fprintf(stderr, "! Invalid pocket to write in write_pocket_pqr !\n");
00289         }
00290 }
00291 
00292 /**
00293    ## FUNCTION:
00294         write_pocket_pdb
00295   
00296    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00297         Write atoms contacted by vertices of the pocket given in argument in 
00298         the pdb format.
00299 
00300   
00301    ## PARAMETRES:
00302         @ const char out[]  : Output file path
00303         @  s_pocket *pocket : The pocket to write
00304   
00305    ## RETURN:
00306   
00307 */
00308 void write_pocket_pdb(const char out[], s_pocket *pocket) 
00309 {
00310         node_vertice *vcur = NULL ;
00311         int i = 0 ;
00312         int cur_size = 0,
00313                 cur_allocated = 10 ;
00314 
00315         s_atm **atms = (s_atm**)my_malloc(sizeof(s_atm*)*10) ;
00316         s_atm *atom = NULL ;
00317 
00318         FILE *f = fopen(out, "w") ;
00319         if(f && pocket) {
00320 
00321                 fprintf(f, "HEADER\n") ;
00322                 fprintf(f, "HEADER This is a pdb format file writen by the programm fpocket.                 \n") ;
00323                 fprintf(f, "HEADER It represents the atoms contacted by the voronoi vertices of the pocket.  \n") ;
00324                 fprintf(f, "HEADER                                                                           \n") ;
00325                 fprintf(f, "HEADER Information about the pocket %5d:\n", pocket->v_lst->first->vertice->resid) ;
00326                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 0  - Pocket Score                      : %.4f\n", pocket->score) ;
00327                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 1  - Number of V. Vertices             : %5d\n", pocket->pdesc->nb_asph) ;
00328                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 2  - Mean alpha-sphere radius          : %.4f\n", pocket->pdesc->mean_asph_ray) ;
00329                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 3  - Mean alpha-sphere SA              : %.4f\n", pocket->pdesc->masph_sacc) ;
00330                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 4  - Mean B-factor                     : %.4f\n", pocket->pdesc->flex) ;
00331                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 5  - Hydrophobicity Score              : %.4f\n", pocket->pdesc->hydrophobicity_score) ;
00332                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 6  - Polarity Score                    : %5d\n", pocket->pdesc->polarity_score) ;
00333                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 7  - Volume Score                      : %.4f\n", pocket->pdesc->volume_score) ;
00334                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 8  - Real volume (approximation)       : %.4f\n", pocket->pdesc->volume) ;
00335                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 9  - Charge Score                      : %5d\n", pocket->pdesc->charge_score) ;
00336                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 10 - Local hydrophobic density Score   : %.4f\n", pocket->pdesc->mean_loc_hyd_dens) ;
00337                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 11 - Number of apolar alpha sphere     : %5d\n", pocket->nAlphaApol) ;
00338                 fprintf(f, "HEADER 12 - Proportion of apolar alpha sphere : %.4f\n", pocket->pdesc->apolar_asphere_prop) ;
00339 
00340         /* First get the list of atoms */
00341                 vcur = pocket->v_lst->first ;
00342 
00343                 while(vcur){
00344                         for(i = 0 ; i < 4 ; i++) {
00345                                 if(!is_in_lst_atm(atms, cur_size, vcur->vertice->neigh[i]->id)) {
00346                                         if(cur_size >= cur_allocated-1) {
00347                                                 cur_allocated *= 2 ;
00348                                                 atms = (s_atm**)my_realloc(atms, sizeof(s_atm)*cur_allocated) ;
00349                                         }
00350                                         atms[cur_size] = vcur->vertice->neigh[i] ;
00351                                         cur_size ++ ;
00352                                 }
00353 
00354                         }
00355                         vcur = vcur->next ;
00356                 }
00357 
00358         /* Then write atoms... */
00359 
00360                 for(i = 0 ; i < cur_size ; i++) {
00361                         atom = atms[i] ;
00362 
00363                         write_pdb_atom_line(f, atom->type, atom->id, atom->name, atom->pdb_aloc, 
00364                                                                         atom->res_name, atom->chain, atom->res_id, 
00365                                                                         atom->pdb_insert, atom->x, atom->y, atom->z,
00366                                                                         atom->occupancy, atom->bfactor, atom->symbol, 
00367                                                                         atom->charge);
00368                 }
00369         
00370                 fprintf(f, "TER\nEND\n") ;
00371                 fclose(f) ;
00372         }
00373         else {
00374                 if(!f) fprintf(stderr, "! The file %s could not be opened!\n", out);
00375                 else fprintf(stderr, "! Invalid pocket to write in write_pocket_pqr !\n");
00376         }
00377 
00378         my_free(atms) ;
00379 }
